snippet.title: SlavicPunk: Oldtimer | PlayStation & Xbox Date Reveal Trailer | Coming on Nov 06, 2024
snippet.description:
🤜 Coming to PS5 and Xbox on November 06, 2024
🤜 Join our official Discord server at https://discord.gg/QZdkVMVu3K

Welcome to SlavicPunk, a world of shady deals, brutality, and blurred lines between cutting-edge technology and humanity. Relish the best features of old-school isometric shooters, enhanced with modern twists and highly dynamic gameplay. Explore the doomed city, hack network systems, solve puzzles, enjoy side-quest stories, and take advantage of stealth techniques... or simply charge straight at your opponents to wreak havoc in a true bulletstorm. All this to recover a key data carrier, so much desired by your peculiar client.

Features:
• Action-packed combat system where every move, cover and bullet matter
• Transparent isometric view and intuitive twin-stick controls
• Harsh yet absolutely addictive setting based on Michał Gołkowski books series
• Fight your foes in melee, shoot them with varied weapons, or use special abilities
• Reveal the compelling story of Yanus, a private investigator with a troubled past         "
